participant_1.background:
I love to drink fancy tea.
I am partly deaf.
I grow roses in my garden.
I am a museum tour guide.
I have a big library at home.

participant_2.background:
Hey there i am 23 and i love food.
I have been trying all types of food everywhere i go.
I own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.
I also like to cook but i am not very good at it.
I have been traveling the world for a years.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_1. Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! I'm participant_2. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to drink fancy tea, grow roses in my garden, and I'm a museum tour guide.
That sounds really cool! I love trying new foods and I've been traveling the world for a few years now. I also own a yacht and I rent it out when I'm not using it.
That's awesome! I've never been on a yacht, but I've always wanted to go. What's your favorite food?
I love seafood, especially sushi. I've been to Japan a few times and I've had some of the best sushi I've ever had there.
That sounds amazing! I love sushi too, but I've never had it in Japan. I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go! It's a once in a lifetime experience.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What's your favorite book?
I don't have a favorite book, but I love reading books about history. I have a big library at home and I'm always looking for new books to read.
That's cool! I love reading books about history too. I've been to a lot of historical sites around the world and I love learning about different cultures.
That sounds amazing! I've only been to a few historical sites, but I'd love to see more.
You should definitely go! It's a great way to learn about different cultures and see the world.
